author: Special Correspondent
text:
There will be power shutdown in the following areas on February 22, Monday, between 9.45 a.m. and 1.45 p.m. on account of maintenance work to be undertaken by Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation at its Vannaththipaarai substation:

Anchorpalayam, Kullappakoundanpatti, Karunakkamuthampatti, Surulipatti, Narayanathevanpatti, Lower Camp, Melmanalar and Keezhmanalar.
title: Power shutdown
